item.title: Map Progress #2
item.author: Author
item.description: Horray! Another map update! This time, we are looking at what will eventually will be our main building. At the minute it’s just a walkway into the cafeteria and there are benches to sit on. The divide in the cafeteria is going to be where the food is served and it will be staff only behind it. There is also a door, which will be permantly there, since this is where you enter and exit!

item.title: Map Progress #1
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to the first map progress! Before I go into what this includes, remember you can always go to the github repo with the assests In this update, I have added a court with a fence (fence incomplete) and a main building with a (to-be) clickable door. The background (currently) is only grass, but I will have sand and stone as I make the map.
